verses.plain: The LORD reigneth; let the earth rejoice; let the multitude of isles be glad thereof.

tokens.t: The
reigneth; let the earth rejoice; let the multitude of isles be glad

verses.plain: Clouds and darkness are round about him: righteousness and judgment are the habitation of his throne.

tokens.t: Clouds and darkness
round about him: righteousness and judgment
the habitation of his throne.

verses.plain: A fire goeth before him, and burneth up his enemies round about.

tokens.t: A fire goeth before him, and burneth up his enemies round about.

verses.plain: His lightnings enlightened the world: the earth saw, and trembled.

tokens.t: His lightnings enlightened the world: the earth saw, and trembled.

verses.plain: The hills melted like wax at the presence of the LORD, at the presence of the Lord of the whole earth.

tokens.t: The hills melted like wax at the presence of the
, at the presence of the Lord of the whole earth.

verses.plain: The heavens declare his righteousness, and all the people see his glory.

tokens.t: The heavens declare his righteousness, and all the people see his glory.

verses.plain: Confounded be all they that serve graven images, that boast themselves of idols: worship him, all ye gods.

tokens.t: Confounded be all they that serve graven images, that boast themselves of idols: worship him, all
gods.

verses.plain: Zion heard, and was glad; and the daughters of Judah rejoiced because of thy judgments, O LORD.

tokens.t: Zion heard, and was glad; and the daughters of Judah rejoiced because of thy judgments, O

verses.plain: For thou, LORD, art high above all the earth: thou art exalted far above all gods.

tokens.t: For thou,
high above all the earth: thou art exalted far above all gods.

verses.plain: Ye that love the LORD, hate evil: he preserveth the souls of his saints; he delivereth them out of the hand of the wicked.

tokens.t: Ye that love the
, hate evil: he preserveth the souls of his saints; he delivereth them out of the hand of the wicked.

verses.plain: Light is sown for the righteous, and gladness for the upright in heart.

tokens.t: Light is sown for the righteous, and gladness for the upright in heart.

verses.plain: Rejoice in the LORD, ye righteous; and give thanks at the remembrance of his holiness.

tokens.t: Rejoice in the
, ye righteous; and give thanks at the remembrance of his holiness.

footnotes.text: multitude…: Heb. many, or, great isles
